content: Entrambi i miei genitori erano disoccupati, ma non lasciò che ciò impedisse loro di accudire adeguatamente me e i miei ventitré fratelli e sorelle.
translations: eng:Both of my parents were unemployed, but they didn't let that stop them from properly looking after me and my 23 brothers
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Guybrush88 (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
